alert.note: Alert for Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Central Oregon Coast; Central Willamette Valley; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 20 at 6:03AM PST until December 20 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Oregon, including the following areas, Central Coast Range of Western Oregon, Central Oregon Coast, Central Willamette Valley, Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills and South Willamette Valley. * WHEN...Until Noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - An area of moderate to heavy rain will persist from the coastal Lane/Lincoln County area and extend northeastward towards Olallie Butte and Mt Hood for much of tonight. This will lead to rising creeks and rivers, particularly on the southern periphery of this line where snow levels will be higher. Another river that that is of highest concern to reach minor flood stage is the Luckiamute River at Suver. The Siletz River at Siletz, the Alsea River at Tidewater and the Pudding River at Aurora are additional rivers to watch during this event. In addition, debris flows and landslides could once again pose an issue in the Riverside, Beachie Creek and Lionshead burn areas as a combination of snowmelt and rain destabilize hillsides. In addition, minor flooding may occur in urban and rural areas, particularly during heavier bouts of rain. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Central Oregon Coast; Central Willamette Valley; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; South Willamette Valley
